turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, you are speaking with David. If you would please check out the following site  URL and let me know your thoughts I would greatly appreciate it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: This looks like a great cause!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Indeed it is, helping children find education and a safe environment are very good causes. How do you feel about charities?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I feel like charities are worth supporting as long as I know my money is being spent well and not mismanaged

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I can understand that, Save the children's only focus is to help kids who cannot help themselves. Some of which are in war form countries or who are on the brink of starvation.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds amazing. How can I help out?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Today you have the opportunity to use a portion of your task fund to go straight towards Save the Children. It is up to you how much you'd like to give. Between 0$ and 2$ but just keep in mind as little as .50 cents can go a long way in these countries. How much would you be willing to give of the 2$ towards this cause?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm willing to donate $1

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's fantastic! After the task is over you will get the opportunity to do so.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: On average, how much money do you normally see people donate from similar tasks?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It varies, sometimes we have people who choose to not donate. However a lot of the time we generally see at least some of the money going to this great cause, even up to the maximum of 2%

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That doesn't sound too bad at all

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree, I also put in at least 2$ a day myself towards this great endeavor. Knowing that it goes to a good cause feels good.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's great! Although charity is a good cause, I want to feel like my time is being valued so I want to leave $1 for myself

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you so much, every amount helps! We are almost done here at which point you will be able to do that. How else do you think we could further help those in need besides what you've seen so far?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would volunteer and help others in my local community by showing up to events in person

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Wow that's fantastic! You are very altruistic, and for that we appreciate you a great deal. If everyone saw the world the same as you did, these problems would exist.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you for the kind words! What would you do?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'd like to see the service branch out, helping women in these countries as well. The countries that these problems occur in women are often not treated the same as we are generally accustomed to.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I too believe that women should have equal opportunities as men across the world - there are likely many different charities out there that better support that cause

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know but I can only do what I can in this organization. I would again like to thank you for your willingness to donate 1$ to help this great cause and hope you have a fantastic rest of your day!
